profile.name: Parthkumar Patel
profile.title: Software Developer
profile.summary: Passionate software developer with expertise in web development, full-stack solutions, and modern web technologies. Experienced in leading web development projects with a focus on performance, security, and user experience.

about.bio: I'm a passionate software developer currently pursuing my MS in Computer Science at Stevens Institute of Technology. With experience in web development and full-stack solutions, I specialize in JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, and modern web technologies. I enjoy leading development projects, collaborating with diverse teams, and creating user-friendly web applications. My experience includes both full-stack development and team leadership, with a focus on delivering high-quality solutions.

details: Focus on advanced computer science topics and research

bullets: Led web development projects, ensuring high-quality delivery with a focus on performance, security, and UX
Collaborated with teams to meet requirements, improve front-end and back-end skills, and stay updated on trends
Worked with TechBilv Web Developer team to build user-friendly web applications and achieve project goals
Contributed to large-scale projects, aligning tasks with marketing goals and receiving positive feedback

projects.name: Online Shop E-commerce Website
projects.description: Created a basic online shop with HTML, CSS, and front-end JavaScript for intuitive user interactions. Employed the MVC pattern on the backend, integrating authentication, product management, and cart functionality.

projects.name: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
projects.description: Developed a browser-based tic-tac-toe game using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Showcased expertise in advanced JavaScript, including DOM manipulation, event handling, and form submissions.

certifications.name: 100 Days Of Code - 2024 Web Development Bootcamp

extracurricular.name: Co-Founder/Event Head
extracurricular.summary: Coordinated logistics for 30+ events, including venue selection, scheduling, setup, and on-site operations. Collaborated with vendors, speakers, and participants to ensure seamless execution and issue resolution.

extracurricular.name: Core Team Member
extracurricular.summary: Key team member at GEC Gandhinagar, organizing Garba festivals, cultural events, day celebrations, and freshers' parties. Managed documentation, sponsorships, permissions, and coordination to ensure seamless events and attendee satisfaction.
